DOC.brief_summary: To assess the pattern of hypertension in the population in terms of presence of additional risk factors (ARF) and cardiovascular risk stratification.
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiological Study In Hypertensive Patients: Assessment Of Risk Factors Prevalence And Of Patients' Management
DOC.criteria: Age 18 to 80 years old Patients with hypertension: newly diagnosed and /or already diagnosed and treated , whether at goal or not for the blood pressure level; Patients with no history of CHD/CVD
DOC.keyword: Epidemiology, hypertension, risk factors, coronary heart disease, patient management, compliance with medication
